easy.q: I have a tail but am not a pet. I can glide through the air and I blink at you when I’m blown by the wind. What am I?
easy.hint: It flies high and dances with the wind.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?

hard.q: In a room with 3 switches and 3 lamps, you can only enter once. You may flip switches any way, then you may enter and tell which switch powers which lamp. How do you do it?
hard.a: Turn on switch 1 for a while, then off; turn on switch 2; then enter. The lamp that’s on is switch 2; the lamp that’s warm but off is switch 1; the remaining lamp is switch 3.
hard.hint: Use heat and light to match each lamp to a switch.
